alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 4:26PM CDT until April 19 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern La Salle County in north central Illinois... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Earlville, or 9 miles northeast of Mendota, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Mendota, Sheridan, Lake Holiday, Somonauk, Earlville, Serena, Leland, Millington, Harding and Norway. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 71 and 74. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
